dotnetType.name: DecimalSchemaBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.DecimalResolution" />.

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.BytesSchema" />/<see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DecimalLogicalType" /> build result
            if <paramref name="resolution" /> is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.DecimalResolution" />; an unsuccessful
            <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" /> build result otherwise.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DecimalSchemaBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Abstract.SchemaBuilderCase
